calendar.tapABankHolidayToEditItsDetails: Tap a bank holiday to edit its details:

calendar.noCalendarFoundOnThisDevice: No calendar found on this device. Please install and launch your calendar app, then try again.

calendar.failedToSaveEventToYourCalendar: Failed to save event to your calendar.

settings.factoryResetRemoveAllSavedBankHolidaysFr: Factory reset - remove all saved bank holidays from your device

about.bankedDescription1: Banked is an app that conveniently shows the next five bank holidays in the United Kingdom. These bank holidays are inclusive of all four nations. Users can edit the names and dates of any bank holidays, and reset these entries.
about.bankedDescription2: Banked is an app created by Dean Spooner, an app and frontend web developer.
about.tapHereToVisitDeansGitHubPage: Tap here to visit Dean's GitHub page
about.tapHereToVisitDeansPortfolio: Tap here to visit Dean's portfolio
about.bankedBuiltByDeanSpoonerFebruary2026: Banked - built by Dean Spooner, February 2026

edit.sorryWeEncounteredAnIssueTryingToViewThi: Sorry, we encountered an issue trying to view this bank holiday.
edit.dateMustBeWithinTheNext6Months: Date must be within the next 6 months.
edit.dateMustNotBeInThePast: Date must not be in the past.
edit.areYouSureYouWantToSaveTheseChanges: Are you sure you want to save these changes?
edit.thisWillRevertAllChangesInThisEditedBank: This will revert all changes in this edited bank holiday back to the original bank holiday. Are you sure?
edit.name: Name
edit.typeYourBankHolidayNameHere: Type your bank holiday name here...
